subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
Men and Boys
lead_paragraph: With the increased physicality of the sport, best-of-five matches too often turn into seemingly interminable wars of attrition rather than the displays of finesse more befitting tennis.
snippet: With the increased physicality of the sport, best-of-five matches too often turn into seemingly interminable wars of attrition rather than the displays of finesse more befitting tennis.
